name: What Country Were These Stars Born In? Trivia Quiz | Celebrities | 10 Questions

questions.text: Mel Gibson was born in which country?
questions.explanation:
United States.

	He was born in Peekskill, New York.

questions.text: Sean Connery was born in which country?
questions.explanation:
Scotland.

	He was born Edinburgh, Scotland.

questions.text: Russell Crowe, Academy Award nominee for 'The Insider', was born in which country?
questions.explanation:
New Zealand.

	Even though considered to be Australian, he was born in New Zealand before moving to Australia at a very young age.

questions.text: Sophia Loren was born in which country?
questions.explanation:
Italy.

	She was born in Rome, Italy.

questions.text: Michael J. Fox was born in which country?
questions.explanation:
Canada.

	He was born in Edmonton, Alberta, Canada.

questions.text: Nicole Kidman, former wife of Tom Cruise, was born in which country?
questions.explanation:
United States.

	She was born in Honolulu, Hawaii.

questions.text: Lou Diamond Phillips, star of 'La Bamba', was born in which country?
questions.explanation:
Phillipines.

	He was born in Subic Bay Naval Station, Phillipines.

questions.text: Desi Arnaz was born in which country?
questions.explanation:
Cuba.

	He was born in Santiago, Cuba.

questions.text: John Candy was born in which country?
questions.explanation:
Canada.

	He Was born in Newmarket, Ontario, Canada.

questions.text: Bruce Willis was born in which country?
questions.explanation:
West Germany.

	He was born in Idar-Oberstein, Germany.
